verses.name: John 5:5
verses.text: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.

verses.name: John 5:6
verses.text: When Jesus saw him lie, and knew that he had been now a long time in that case, he saith unto him, Wilt thou be made whole?

verses.name: John 5:7
verses.text: The impotent man answered him, Sir, I have no man, when the water is troubled, to put me into the pool: but while I am coming, another steppeth down before me.

verses.name: John 5:8
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.
